## Hair rinse

1tsp cloves \

1. Leave at least 30 mins to cool then strain and use/store.

## Mathri `r family` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

3 P flour \
1 melted butter \
water \
ajwain \
salt \
pepper

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Rub flour and fat to breadcrumbs. 
1. Add water to tight dough. Little kneading. Rest half hour.
1. Roll, prick, fry both sides. (Colour will deepen a little when cooling.)

*Notes*

- 200g butter -> 91 mathri.
- Needs salt.
